raw_comment: i noticed that people around the ages of 15-24 are happier and see things in a better way then older people. i wonder why this is so and the statistics about kids younger then 15 views. this realties to me and my community because we are around this age and we can even prove this because we in the age group. my catchy headline- "is everyone depressed?"
ace_sentences: I noticed that people who are between 15 years and 24 years are happier than older people.
I noticed that people who are between 15 years and 24 years see things in a better way than older people.
I wonder why this is the case.
I wonder about statistics about the views of kids who are younger than 15 years.
People in my community are around this age.
I am in this age group.
We can prove this because we are in this age group.
The headline is: Is everyone depressed?
